title: QuasarMQ
text: QuasarMQ supports QoS levels 0, 1, and 2 similar to MQTT. QuasarMQ is a message broker optimized for IoT telemetry.

title: QuasarMQ
text: The persistence layer is based on an append-only log. It implements a topic-based publish/subscribe model. The CLI command to view topics is `quasarmq topics list`.

title: QuasarMQ
text: Users on forums discussed QuasarMQ tutorials and workshop schedules.

title: LyraV
text: LyraVision can export detections in COCO JSON format.

title: Lyra Vision
text: The pipeline includes frame differencing to reduce false positives. LyraVision is a tiny vision model package for edge cameras.

title: Lyra Vision
text: It provides on-device object detection for five classes by default. LyraVision models are quantized to INT8 for performance.

title: LyraV
text: LyraV release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: LyraV
text: LyraV release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: Lyra Vision
text: Lyra Vision community survey results will be published next quarter.

title: OrionSearch
text: The indexer uses incremental segment merges. Synonym expansion is configured in `orion.yml`. The query language supports proximity operators using `~k` syntax.

title: OrionSearch
text: It supports field-level boosting and phrase queries. It integrates with CI/CD tools.

title: OrionSearch
text: OrionSearch is a full-text search engine with BM25 ranking.

title: OrionSearch
text: OrionSearch release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: OrionSearch
text: Users on forums discussed OrionSearch tutorials and workshop schedules.

title: OrionSearch
